exceptions.exn: In environment factorial_cancel : forall n a b : nat, fact n * a = fact n * b -> a = b p : nat Hp : p <> 0 expo_p_cancel : forall n a b : nat, expo n p * a = expo n p * b -> a = b phi_Zp_eq : forall n r : nat, 〚 φ n r 〛 = 〚 fact r 〛 Psi_Zp_eq : forall n : nat, 〚 Ψ n 〛 = expoZp n 〚 fact (p - 1) 〛 Hprime : prime p phi_Zp_invertible : forall n r : nat, r < p -> Zp_invertible Hp 〚 φ n r 〛 n : nat Unable to unify "exists i : Z_Zp p, i ⊗ 〚 Π ?M1443 (fun i0 : nat => i0 + (?M1442 * p + 1)) 〛 = Op" with "exists i : Z_Zp p, i ⊗ 〚 Ψ n 〛 = Op".
The reference Nat.lt_pred_iff was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hprime was not found in the current environment.

original: apply phi_Zp_invertible. apply Nat.lt_pred_iff. apply Hprime.
